posts.message:
Hello there ,
is there anyone annoyed from duplicated sent mails from outlook (live.com ) mails using IMAP 
just when i send any reply from any mail client i found it twice inside inbox and inside sent mail , but if i used webmail it work perfectly ,

after long search most people complain from that !

posts.message:
Guys, why do you think it's so hard to hire Team Leaders these days?

What exactly make you decide to join a company? I mean what are the actual benefits you're looking for?

Care to share your inputs?
Thanks :)

Hi Geeks 
I need this answer ASAP please it is urgent, 
I want to create back-end service broadcast data in real time to number of user listens to it.
The back-end service also collect its  data from other servers in real time.
What is technology should i use to make data real time between my-service, front-end users and other servers which have data. 

after search i found that socket is good choice.
Is Socket will be valid in this scenario ? 
Is there any better protocol ?  
#Thanks

Android developers.. help needed !! 
instant run icon is not active ..i followed the setup steps mentioned in the official documentation here: https://developer.android.com/studio/releases/gradle-plugin.html?
and seen also this : http://stackoverflow.com/questions/42571175/android-studio-2-3-instant-run-not-working
also tried to disable and enabling it ..and non of these worked. 

i'm using Ubuntu with latest updates ..with an infinix note 3 as a target development device . 

Gradle latest plugin (checked) 
any help ?

Update : it works seamlessly on emulator
posts.caption: developer.android.com
posts.description: The Android Studio build system is based on Gradle, and the Android plugin for Gradle adds several features that are specific to building Android apps. Although the Android plugin is typically updated in lock-step with Android Studio, the plugin (and the rest of the Gradle system) can run independen...
